Name.en-GB: HPM Diet - Dog W1 Weight Loss & Diabetes
Name.en: HPM Diet - Dog W1 Weight Loss & Diabetes

B2C Short description.en-GB: en-GB Helps your dog to lose excess weight and regulate their blood sugar. Weight loss doesn’t have to mean hunger, with a high-protein, high-fibre recipe to keep your dog happy and satisfied on their journey to a healthy weight.
B2C Short description.en: Helps your dog to lose excess weight and regulate their blood sugar. Weight loss doesn’t have to mean hunger, with a high-protein, high-fibre recipe to keep your dog happy and satisfied on their journey to a healthy weight.

B2C Full Description.en-GB:
en-GB Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food 
Help your dog to shed excess weight quickly with Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food.


Weight loss for dogs isn’t as simple as cutting down their portion sizes. To make sure your dog is losing weight the healthy way, you need a complete and balanced weight control dog food with low energy density, like Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1.


Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1:


• Contains the ideal ratio of high protein and low carbohydrates to help your dog preserve muscle mass while they lose fat.

• Prevents glucose spikes after eating and keeps blood sugar stable, helping to manage diabetes.

• Keeps your dog happy with a tasty combination of rich animal proteins and satisfying fats.


Because excess weight can be tough on the joints, Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 contains chondroitin and chitosan to protect the joints and halt degenration. It also features extra vitamins and minerals to make sure your dog is getting all the nutrients they need from smaller rations.
B2C Full Description.en:
Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food 

Help your dog to shed excess weight quickly with Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food. 

Weight loss for dogs isn’t as simple as cutting down their portion sizes. To make sure your dog is losing weight the healthy way, you need a complete and balanced weight control dog food with low energy density, like Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1.

Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1:

• Contains the ideal ratio of high protein and low carbohydrates to help your dog preserve muscle mass while they lose fat. 
• Prevents glucose spikes after eating and keeps blood sugar stable, helping to manage diabetes. 
• Keeps your dog happy with a tasty combination of rich animal proteins and satisfying fats. 

Because excess weight can be tough on the joints, Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 contains chondroitin and chitosan to protect the joints and halt degenration. It also features extra vitamins and minerals to make sure your dog is getting all the nutrients they need from smaller rations.

Key benefit summary text.en-GB: ** EN-GB ** Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 features a high-protein, low-carb formula to help your dog lose weight quickly and effectively. It’s proven to help dogs reach their healthiest weight up to 7 weeks faster than other weight loss dog foods.
